                     java.awt.Dimension dimension,
                     int maxHeight,
                     boolean immovable,
                     boolean interactable)
        Default constructor publicly accessible
        Parameters:
        centerLocation - Center point of the percentage bar
        colour - Colour of the percentage bar
        motion - initial motion
        dimension - dimensions
        maxHeight - maximum height
        immovable - if the percentage bar can be moved
        interactable - if the percentage bar can be interacted with
